name: Mad Hunter
description:
Very funny scroller!

Mad Hunter is scroller with cool graphics and cheerful gameplay!
The Mad Hunter You play as a very obsessed with pitching, which went for a jog, to stretch my fists!

Collect protein, swing and fight with the bandits

Improve yourself, be the strongest of all, pick up the gain on the engines of cars, buy weapons or bikes!
With the game Mad Hunter arsenal and steep pumping you will never be bored!

Protein Call

Kill all who stand in your way! Shoot at them from a vending machine or bike Davie - a choice only for you.
Mad Hunter allows you to play in different ways, but each of them is very difficult and full of danger!
